author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/redhat-8.x : First shot at a RedHat 8.0 package.  It still has
some problems that need to be addressed but this should be enough to get
people going.  Remember to vist http://summersoft.fay.ar.us:81/ to pick up
1. Fix the Perl requirement (make sure and install the subversion package
2. Find out why it seems to build and install fine on a fresh RedHat 8.0 but
has some problems on a system upgraded to RedHat 8.0.
